Project Manage System, your wingman to get the manage work done!

Project Manage System is a system build on springboot to manage projects and employees.

Posted by JYL on December 14, 2020 · 1 min read

Introduction

Project Manage System is a demo that manage to maintain the many to many relationships between projects and employees, Set project timelines, Count projects nums at each stage and so on.

Building Tools

Springboot+Bootstrap+Postgresql+Aws

Preview

Note:Use this account to test CRUD functions
